name: CreateMonitorNotificationRule
description:
Creates a monitor notification rule in Datadog.

Use this tool to set up a notification rule for a specific monitor in Datadog. This allows for alerting based on monitor condition changes.

parameters.name: monitor_notification_rule_details
parameters.description: JSON object detailing the monitor notification rule, including attributes like recipients, conditions, and filters.

recipients.description: A list of recipients to notify. Uses the same format as the monitor `message` field. Must not start with an '@'.

scope.description: The scope to which the monitor applied.

fallback_recipients.description: A list of recipients to notify. Uses the same format as the monitor `message` field. Must not start with an '@'.

conditional_recipients.description: Use conditional recipients to define different recipients for different situations.

filter.description: Filter used to associate the notification rule with monitors.

name.description: The name of the monitor notification rule.

recipients.description: A list of recipients to notify. Uses the same format as the monitor `message` field. Must not start with an '@'.

attributes.description: Attributes of the monitor notification rule.

data.description: Object to create a monitor notification rule.

value_schema.description: Request body to create a monitor notification rule.
